description.p: OpenJazz is an open source reimplementation of the 2D platforming game Jazz Jackrabbit.

ul.li: Play through the campaign (including Holiday Hare '95) in singleplayer, cooperative, battle or race modes.
Support for widescreen and high resolutions up to 4K.
Support for adjusting gameplay options, such as not picking up unneeded items and having more than one bird companion.

description.p: Original commercial (https://www.gog.com/game/jazz_jackrabbit_collection) or shareware (https://www.moddb.com/games/jazz-jackrabbit/downloads/shareware-demo) data files are required to run Jazz Jackrabbit. Before running OpenJazz, the original Jazz Jackrabbit installation folder should be copied to (create folders as needed):
